original_title: The Stranglers: Live at Alexandra Palace
overview: Men in black, the Stranglers perform what turned out to be their final gig with founder vocalist Hugh Cornwell, live at Alexandra Palace on 11th August 1990. Tracks include 'No More Heroes', 'Something Better Change', 'Duchess' and Kinks cover 'All Day and All of the Night'.
title: The Stranglers: Live at Alexandra Palace
